content: I'll check the gym's website or give them a call to see if they offer spin classes. I'm really looking forward to trying it out and pushing myself with a more intense workout. By the way, I've been tracking my progress on my fitness tracker, and I've noticed that I've increased my average daily step count by about 2,000 steps since I started taking these classes. It's great to see the impact of my workouts on my overall fitness!
